defaultMessage: Something went wrong, please try again later
passwordTooShort: The password must to be at least 8 characters
passwordMissingNumber: The password must include at least one number
passwordMissingLowercase: The password must include at least one lower case character
passwordMissingUppercase: The password must include at least one upper case character
passwordMissingSymbol: The password must include at least one symbol
authErrorCodeMismatch: Invalid confirmation code provided, please try again
authErrorRequestLimitExceeded: Attempt limit exceeded, please try again later
organizationDoesNotExist: The requested organization does not exist
eventDoesNotExist: The requested event does not exist
serverError401: Your session has expired.  Please sign in again.
serverError4xx: We are currently unable to fulfill the request. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
serverError5xx: The server is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
serverDefaultError: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
